about_the_game:
The Victorian era slums can be hard on a blossoming young adult, but there are always opportunities for greater fortunes. You and up to three others have been hand selected to run some simple errands. The gentleman in the pub is incredibly generous. He provides you information on abandoned places, and is willing to buy any of the items you manage to bring back to him. Of course he expects compensation for his efforts. As long as you continue to bring him what he needs he will be able to provide you information at an ever increasing price. Luckily for you every location has items to pilfer. Unluckily for you, you aren’t the only thing there… but surely you’ll survive the night.



  • Loot valuable items from various haunted places that can be sold for equipment to improve your future odds.
  • Solve puzzles, unlock doors, avoid traps and discover hidden items and locations.
  • Simple interface and inventory system keep the focus on the environment and help immerse you in the Victorian Era cooperative horror environment.
  • Survive the night as you try to outwit Victorian Era horrors and haunts.
  • Satisfy the Gentleman in the Pub, or risk being replaced.



  • You will select missions from the local pub and use various items to help in your looting. Larger bags, lanterns, lockpicks, and items to slow the creatures of the night, along with other items, are available.
  • The challenge level can be set to a more leisurely experience with less risk, to near impossible levels, the bigger the risk the bigger the reward, the choice is yours… if you dare.
  • You will be dropped off at your selected location and will need to be out before the witching hour, or before you fall to one of the various deadly perils.



  • Play with up to 4 friends and survive the night. Sometimes friends make the night easier. Other times they may make it deadlier.
  • Play across various input types.

content_descriptors.notes: The game offers creepy and realistic environments where players can die horribly in a various amount of ways including, being eaten, dismemberment and decapitation.

name: The Rookery Way

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 3700 or Intel i5 equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 970
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: The Rookery is a Victorian Era themed survival horror game. It pits up to 4 players against various horrifying creatures, as they try to loot valuable items to sell. Their wits and gear just might get them through the night.
